text: Hole punch from Leitz, currently at the Museum Europäischer Kulturen, Berlin The Esselte Leitz GmbH & Co KG, also Leitz, is a German manufacturer of office products. The company, which is headquartered in Stuttgart, is owned by Esselte since 1998. Today the brand Leitz is used by Esselte mainly for filing and workspace products. Leitz was founded by Louis Leitz. ==See also == *Leitz, unrelated German manufacturing firm founded by Albert Leitz in 1876 (www.leitz.org) *Leica ==External links== *Leitz Corporation *Leitz Cloud Category:Office supply companies of Germany Category:Manufacturing companies based in Stuttgart
title: Esselte Leitz GmbH & Co KG
